scripts.build:darwin: cp src/index.html dist/index.html && cp src/index.css dist/css/index.css && tsc
scripts.build:linux: cp src/index.html dist/index.html && cp src/index.css dist/css/index.css && tsc
scripts.build:win32: copy src\index.html dist\index.html && copy src\index.css dist\css\index.css && tsc
scripts.clean:darwin: rm -f dist/*.html && rm -f dist/*.js && rm -f dist/*.map && rm -f dist/css/*
scripts.clean:linux: rm -f dist/*.html && rm -f dist/*.js && rm -f dist/*.map && rm -f dist/css/*
scripts.clean:win32: del dist\*.html /Q && del dist\*.js /Q && del dist\*.map /Q && del dist\css\* /Q
scripts.make:darwin: npm run clean && npm run build && electron-forge make --platform darwin -- --command=make
scripts.make:linux: npm run clean && npm run build && electron-forge make --platform linux -- --command=make
scripts.make:win32: npm run clean && npm run build && electron-forge make --platform win32 -- --command=make
scripts.publish:darwin: npm run clean && npm run build && electron-forge publish --platform darwin -- --command=publish
scripts.publish:linux: npm run clean && npm run build && electron-forge publish --platform linux -- --command=publish
scripts.publish:win32: npm run clean && npm run build && electron-forge publish --platform win32 -- --command=publish
scripts.start:darwin: npm run clean && npm run build && electron-forge start -- --command=start
scripts.start:linux: npm run clean && npm run build && electron-forge start -- --command=start
scripts.start:win32: npm run clean && npm run build && electron-forge start -- --command=start
